content: this legal text summarizes a court case that took place in pescara in 2012 the case involved the dissolution of a community and the division of property the parties involved are not mentioned the court ruled that the community property acquired by the parties through a public deed is dissolved the specific properties involved including agricultural land and a building are listed one party is assigned a payment of eur 100000 the court also declares that the costs of the proceedings will be divided equally between the parties the plaintiffs heirs dmg and dmu sued the defendants heirs dmp and dmb over the division of inherited assets the court considered the parties deeds of assignment and the value of the estate determined by an expert the court concluded that the property should be allocated to the party with the greater share taking into account living habits and the need for repairs one party is ordered to pay a lump sum to the other as a correlative adjustment the court also accepts the request for reimbursement of building repair expenses the costs of the case are to be divided between the parties the courts decision was made on april 27 2012
